name: bkstar-web
description: Clone giao diện BKSTAR (https://bkstar.com.vn/) dùng cho mục đích học tập và kiểm thử.

scripts.dev:info: node scripts/detect-server.js info && npm run dev
scripts.preview:pretty: npm run snapshot && node scripts/preview-inject-override.js && npm run build && vite preview --open /snapshot/index-snapshot.html
scripts.preview:pretty:fast: cross-env PRELOAD_STYLES=normal PRELOAD_WEIGHTS=400,700 npm run preview:pretty
scripts.preview:pretty:content: cross-env PRELOAD_STYLES=normal,italic PRELOAD_WEIGHTS=400,500,700 npm run preview:pretty
scripts.preview:pretty:brand: cross-env PRELOAD_STYLES=normal,italic PRELOAD_WEIGHTS=400,600,800 npm run preview:pretty
scripts.snapshot: node scripts/snapshot-site.js && node scripts/fix-lazy-images.js && node scripts/postprocess-fonts-and-rename.js
scripts.visual:ci: cross-env PAGES_ONLY=1 STRICT=1 wait-on http-get://localhost:5173/snapshot/index-snapshot.html && node scripts/check-images.js && node scripts/check-css-images.js && node scripts/visual-compare.js
scripts.visual:ci:full: cross-env STRICT=1 wait-on http-get://localhost:5173/snapshot/index-snapshot.html && node scripts/check-images.js && node scripts/check-css-images.js && node scripts/visual-compare.js
